citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The current program of veterinary care does not account for the facility's 2 doves, 2 red-tailed hawks, 1 Canadian goose,
1 mallard duck, 2 great horned owls, 1 barred owl, 2 screech owls, and 2 American kestrels. A program veterinary care is
required to demonstrate adequate veterinary care is being provided to the animals through attending veterinarian
oversight of health care and husbandry. Correct by ensuring that the program of veterinary care includes all regulated
animals at the facility, that the attending veterinarian is given adequate authority for their care by formal arrangement, and
that the document is available for inspection by APHIS officials. Correct by 9/20/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The current program of veterinary care does not account for the facility's 2 doves, 2 red-tailed hawks, 1 Canadian goose, 
1 mallard duck, 2 great horned owls, 1 barred owl, 2 screech owls, and 2 American kestrels. A program veterinary care is 
required to demonstrate adequate veterinary care is being provided to the animals through attending veterinarian 
oversight of health care and husbandry. Correct by ensuring that the program of veterinary care includes all regulated 
animals at the facility, that the attending veterinarian is given adequate authority for their care by formal arrangement, and 
that the document is available for inspection by APHIS officials. Correct by 9/20/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
